body_html: It generates unused variable warnings, because now all cudnn routines call PyObject* accumTensorClass = getAccumTensorClass(args); even though only batch norm uses differently typed accum tensors. Could not figure out how to get around it, would appreciate if someone gave me pointers how to do that in cwrap.

body: It generates unused variable warnings, because now all cudnn routines call ```PyObject* accumTensorClass = getAccumTensorClass(args);``` even though only batch norm uses differently typed accum tensors. Could not figure out how to get around it, would appreciate if someone gave me pointers how to do that in cwrap.
